alert.note: Alert for Benton; Chippewa; Douglas; Kandiyohi; Meeker; Morrison; Pope; Stearns; Stevens; Swift; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 24 at 3:12PM CST until January 26 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Chippewa; Douglas; Kandiyohi; Meeker; Morrison; Pope; Stearns; Stevens; Swift; Todd
